name: Versioning
description: Module that supports versioning a project to help manage amendments

authors.name: Richard Hardy
authors.institution: University of Cambridge - Cambridge Cancer Trials Centre

project-settings.name: Provide the suffix used to identify the version field on a form. Any field name can be used as long as it ends with the given suffix. For example, to use the form name as the prefix, replace any spaces with _ and then add the suffix; i.e. with the suffix '_crfver', the crf version field for the form 'Patient Details' would be called 'patient_details_crfver'
The current crf version. When updated, any new forms containing a field with the given suffix will automatically be updated with this value
If checked, any fields identified as versioning fields will be automatically set as readonly
